verbs.description: [ARG0: James Comey] [V: says] [ARG1: President Donald Trump is ‘ just making stuff up’ when he accuses the former FBI director of breaking the law by releasing his memos] .
James Comey says President Donald Trump [V: is] ‘ just making stuff up’ when he accuses the former FBI director of breaking the law by releasing his memos .
James Comey says [ARG0: President Donald Trump] is ‘ [ARGM-ADV: just] [V: making] [ARG1: stuff] up’ [ARGM-TMP: when he accuses the former FBI director of breaking the law by releasing his memos] .
James Comey says President Donald Trump is ‘ just making stuff up’ [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: he] [V: accuses] [ARG1: the former FBI director] [ARG2: of breaking the law by releasing his memos] .
James Comey says President Donald Trump is ‘ just making stuff up’ when he accuses [ARG0: the former FBI director] of [V: breaking] [ARG1: the law] [ARGM-MNR: by releasing his memos] .
James Comey says President Donald Trump is ‘ just making stuff up’ when he accuses [ARG0: the former FBI director] of breaking the law by [V: releasing] [ARG1: his memos] .
